title: Looking for T206 Seymour Throwing with various Backs
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 Seymour Throwing with various Backs
posts.post_content:
Hoping to add to my Seymour throwing back set.. its been a while since I have been able to add to it.

I will pay top dollar for any of the following... 

T206 Seymour Throwing.. 
Sweet Caporal 350 fact 25
American Beauty
Drum Back
Lenox
Blank Back
Broadleaf
